oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Challenging the norm – lameness on dairy and beef cattle operations with particular focus on digital dermatitis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Doepfer, Doerte
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: After a (very) brief introduction to digital dermatitis (DD) pre­vention and control, different approaches to AI-enhanced de­tection tools for DD and lameness in cattle will be discussed regarding their challenges and potential for informed decision-making in bovine practice.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; Vol. 58 No. 58 (2024): 2024 AABP Annual Conference Proceedings; 66
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Copyright (c) 2025 American Association of Bovine Practitioners
